page.title: 16INDUSTRY (SHOWERINGS LTD.)
page.content: SHEPTON IS A GROWING CENTRE FOR INDUSTRY.A NEW INDUSTRIAL SITE IS UNDER DISCUSSION AT THE MOMENT.A MAJOR PROBLEM HAS BEEN THE LACK OF LAND. NEW PLACES THAT HAVE BEEN AVAILABLE IN SHEPTON HAVE BEEN SNAPPED UP AND BEEN TAKEN UP BY EXPANDING BUSINESSES.IN THE MIDDLE AGES SHEPTON MALLET WAS AN IMPORTANT WOOL TRADING CENTRE ,WHICH DIED OUT. THERE ARE NOW 3 INDUSTRIAL ESTATES IN SHEPTON SHOWERINGS EMPLOYS A TOTAL OF 540 PEOPLE.BABYCHAM IS MADE FROM SPECIALLY GROWN PERRY PEARS.THEY ARE FAMOUS FOR MAKING BABYCHAM AND CIDER.THEY USE LOCALLY GROWN PEARS FROM THERE ORCHARDS TOGETHER WITH PEARS FROM WORCS. GLOUCS.AND HEREFORD.A SPECIAL TYPE OF PEAR IS USED AND SOME JUICE IS IMPORTED FROM AUSTRIA AND GERMANY.A QUARTER OF A MILLION LITRES IS MADE ON AVERAGE PER WEEK.
